name: FORGOTTEN GIFTS
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
Forgotten Gifts-a dynamic shooter where the main character Santa Claus, return the gifts to the fairy-tale snow world of the inhabitants of the different types of xmas cannons.

The game is a collection of scattered gifts in locations filled with fabulous creatures, collect them all and go to the next place. Plunge into the new year atmosphere and get a festive mood with this fun game.

Simple and beautiful graphics
New year atmosphere
Retro-style
Simple gameplay
Several types of weapons
Xmas mood
Funny opponents
